wasara siyayakata pera siduwu rajakiya wiwahayaka ahambau prathiwipakayawu, 1603di siduwu kiritayange susangamaya thulin, rajadhani deka pudgalika susangamayakin bandunada, maha brithanya rajadhaniya lesin purna deshapalana susangamaya sandaha, 1706di piwisunu susangama giwisuma saha 1707di (giwisuma aparanumatha kerumata) sammathawu susangam panath awashya wiya. 1800 di thawaduratath sammatha kerunu susangam panathak thulin susangamaya thulata ayarlanthaya ek karamin, maha brithanya ha ayarlanthaya eksath rajadhaniya thanana ladi. 19wana siyawasehi agabhagayehi sita, jathikawadi deshapalana pakshayanta labunu sahayogayehi wardhanaya ha samagama, palamuwa ayarlanthaya arabhaya, 1922di ayarlantha diwayinehi boho pradeshayata nidahasada, boho pasuwa skotlanthaya saha welsaye arabhaya, uthuru ayarlanthaye, skotlanthaye saha welsaye, balaya wimadhyagatha kerunu parlimenthu ho manthrana sabha pihituwimada siduwiya.
